li.a: What Happens at a Board Meeting

div.div: No contents are available

img.alt: Learning at Home
Toddlers Learn form Home
Toddler Zoom
Inspire logo
img.title: Inspire logo

span.span: As we finish the first full month of remote instruction, I’d like to remind you of some District services you may need throughout this time:

Please remember we have extended our meal service to all families, with pick-up for breakfast and lunch from 9:30am to 11:30am at all school buildings throughout the district, including preschools and administration building. Drive up to the school bus in the parking lot for pick up.
I also want to remind you that we continue to repair student iPads and provide loaners when necessary. To request an iPad repair, please first access the

link found on the district website under the Remote/Virtual Instructional Plan tab to fill out a short questionnaire that details the problem. Our IT team will respond quickly to address all repair issues.

If your student is struggling in any way, academically or emotionally, we want to help. Let your principal know if anything is getting in the way of your child’s remote instruction and learning. No problem is too small for you to reach out for assistance.
All guidance counselors at every grade level are here for our students.

span.style: font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; letter-spacing: 0.25pt;

span.span: If your child needs to talk about school work or grades, friendships, or other problems, they can turn to their school counselor as a first step toward getting the help they need and deserve.
And remember, The Haven offers distance counseling for any student as needed. If your child is feeling stressed, they can text or call the Haven hotline at 888-222-2228.

p.span: I continue to be grateful to all students and parents who reach out to me, our principals, and teachers and staff across the district, with encouraging words, assistance, and support. We truly are one big Piscataway Family.
